text:
be nonlinear so that y = σ(f(x)), where f(x) = θ⊤φ(x) is the linear
regression model from (9.13). We can therefore think of a generalized
linear model in terms of function composition y = σ ◦f, where f is a
linear regression model and σthe activation function. Note that although
we are talking about “generalized linear models”, the outputs y are no
longer linear in the parameters θ. In logistic regression , we choose the logistic regression
logistic sigmoid σ(f) = 1
